verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The children's Friend is Jesus, He calls them to His side; He gave His life a ransom, Heav'n's gate to open wide.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: The children's Friend is Jesus, Jesus, Jesus; His life He gave their souls to save, The children's Friend is Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The children's Friend is Jesus, He loves their joys to share, He knows their little sorrows, He longs each one to bear.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The children's Friend is Jesus, There's no one else so true; He keeps all those who trust Him, As no one else can do.
